item.title: Azure Virtual Desktop Image Management Automated - Part 3 Create AVD sessionhosts on image version with ARM
item.description: This article is serie of posts about AVD Image Management Automated. In this part we are going to add new sessionhosts to an existing AVD hostpool based on a ARM template.

item.title: Using KeyVault certificates in Azure DevOps
item.description: Azure KeyVault is the security key management system in Azure where you can store keys, secrets and certificates. From that place you can use the items everywhere you like.

item.title: Monitor active M365 ServiceHealth services only with PowerShell
item.description: You have some Microsoft 365 (M365) customers which you like to monitor. Every day you are looking at the customer specific M365 portal looking for Microsoft event.
